abstract: Editorial considers impact of 2012 government recommendation against routine type of prostate cancer screening; cites two studies published in Journal of the American Medical Association which show subsequent drop in detection and diagnosis rates; concurs with editorial in same journal proposing test be reserved for men at high risk.
lead_paragraph: It is time to focus on ways to use the screening test more effectively.

headline.main: A Better Way to Screen for Prostate Cancer
headline.print_headline: A Better Way to Screen for Prostate Cancer

snippet: It is time to focus on ways to use the screening test more effectively.
